'''Delerue''' is Lovi's father and a relative of Aunt Dumay.

==Profile==
Delerue is a scientist who works at the Fontaine Research Institute. He is also a reviewer of The Steambird. He tends to write lengthy reviews. Sometimes while writing he will skip on meals, only drinking tea.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Their Childhood: City Caper}}</ref>

Delerue sometimes goes on business trips, asking others to look after Lovi.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Their Childhood: Good Times}}</ref>

==Trivia==

* {{W|Georges Delerue}} was a French composer who composed over 350 scores for cinema and television.
